page.title: 19The village Farmer _Bramley
page.content: { The village farmer is Harry Jones.}He married the local farmer's daughter 40 years ago and has been a farmer ever since.His day begins at 6.15am when he gets up and feeds the cattle in the sheds round the farmyard. He then has his breakfast and prepares for the day's work. The field work is done during the morning, crops depending on season. {This particular day he has planted {5000 cauliflowers.}He comes home for lunch at 12.30. During the afternoon he does more seasonal outdoor work. At about 4.30pm the cattle are fed again _ with barley, root vegetables, hay, straw and molasses. Harry's tea depends on the weather.In bad weather he cleans buildings or fixes machinery { Vegetables are sold direct to the {public, whilst the cereal crops are {sold to grain merchants.
